location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Pol Ext 6443/49 'Information on rents, local wages and hire of furniture in Bagdad, for information of the High Commissioner for Pakistan in London'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding the costs incurred by the British Embassy, Baghdad, in the payment of rents, wages for local staff and hire of furniture. The information has been compiled at the request of the High Commissioner for Pakistan in London. As well as the Embassy, the other primary correspondent is the Foreign Office. The file includes a divider, which gives a list of correspondence references contained in the file by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.

name.namePart: High Commission of Pakistan to the United Kingdom
